nodes.text: A sentient species existed in the galaxy. They had several pairs of horns above their mouths. Yasto Attsmun, Brushaun, and a crime boss were members of this species.
The species were distinguished by the several pairs of horns that grew above their mouths. They had black eyes, white hair, and brown or white skin.
Brushaun was a member of the species who lost 2000 credits to Lando Calrissian in a card game on Canto Bight. Believing the man cheated, he tracked him to Batuv and confronted him.

In 0 ABY, a crime boss of the species bought one of two lightsabers formally owned by the ancient Sith Darth Atrius. The lightsaber enraged him, and in his uncontrollable anger, he killed his four Devaronian thugs, dying in the process.
Yasto Attsmun was a member of the species and a baron. He hosted parties aboard his yacht, the Undisputed Victor, on Cantonica.
